Pre-Game Insights: Both teams have won their most recent games while batting second.
Pakistan is expected to field first if they win the toss.
The pitch is expected to be fast and have spin, with a par score of 170-180.
Sri Lanka aims to maintain their winning streak, while Pakistan looks to continue their momentum.
Top batsmen to watch: Kusal Mendis for Sri Lanka and Mohammad Rizwan for Pakistan.
Top bowlers to watch: Wanindu Hasaranga for Sri Lanka and Naseem Shah for Pakistan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is played under warm conditions with a high temperature.
The wicket in Dubai has become quicker as the tournament progresses.
